name: Dinner Tonight: Sausages With Onion and Bay
description: This is a grill recipe. Perhaps that’s why I picked the recipe on one of the coldest days of the fall so far. It just begs for some charcoal and a nice day. Fortunately, it will passively take the plunge...

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the broiler. Curl the sausages to make sort of a "U" shape. Stuff some red onion and bay leaf in between. Sprinkle the olive oil on top.
Spear the meat and vegetables with a skewer.
Place in the broiler and cook for 5-10 minutes per side until the sausages are cooked through.
